name: Keeping You All to Myself! Kasumi Nakasu
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavor_text: All right, I get it. You just love me so much that you were speechless.

name: “Kasumin Is the Lead” Kasumi Nakasu
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 3 or more characters with "Kasumi(かすみ)" in their card names, this card's card name is also regarded as the same card name of all of your characters with "Kasumi(かすみ)" in their card names on your stage while in your hand.

【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character with "Kasumi(かすみ)" in its card name from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Sending It Afar, Shizuku Osaka
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or less characters in their center stage, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it at the bottom of their deck.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: It's gotta be that over there! See that huge tree down there on the right?

name: “Birthday Heroine” Shizuku Osaka
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and move it to another open position of their center stage.

name: I Like Smiling, Rina Tennoji
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 0 or lower 《Music》 character, put it in any position of your stage, shuffle your deck, and at the end of your turn, put that character into your memory.
flavor_text: Because I'm so happy that you understand me.

name: “A Happy Birthday” Rina Tennoji
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory."

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: “Heart's Delight” Shioriko Mifune
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.

name: It's Like a Dream, Shioriko Mifune
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: You won't mind being seen with me? Is it okay if I'm next to you?

name: “Extraordinary Birthday” Ai Miyashita
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "Feelings to Express, Rina Tennoji" get +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."

【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Connecting Melody, Rina Tennoji" or "Feelings to Express, Rina Tennoji", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Be Captivated by Me! Lanzhu Zhong
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may put this card into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: “Lanzhu's Aspirations” Lanzhu Zhong
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character in your center stage, this card gets +1500 power.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open middle position of your center stage.

name: Ready to Hang Out With Me? Ai Miyashita
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I had so, SO much fun today. And that's 'cause I got to spend it with just the two of us.

name: We'll Be Together Forever, Ayumu Uehara
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 yellow character and up to 1 red character and up to 1 blue character from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: You were so sweet, and you still are now. You never change, and I love you for that.

name: “Celebrating Together” Ayumu Uehara
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 Experience During your turn, if the total level of the cards in your level is 1 or higher, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn."

name: “Take the Forest's Protection” Setsuna Yuki
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Music》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Music》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Well then, let's go... Please keep your eyes on me!

name: “Gathering What I Love” Setsuna Yuki
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.

name: So That It Reaches You, Karin Asaka
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your clock, and return it to your hand. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your clock.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: This feels so good that I might even doze off if I let my mind wander.

name: All Smartened Up! Kanata Konoe
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 《Music》 characters from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Favorite Pillow" marker underneath this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, and 【STAND】 it.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 "Favorite Pillow" or 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Return 1 marker underneath this card to your hand.

name: “I Love Celebrations” Mia Taylor
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: “Molte Grazie” Emma Verde
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with [[gate.gif]] in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.

name: Don't Let Your Eyes Stray, Mia Taylor
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When your other 《Music》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Music》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavor_text: *Whimper* Even the Spartans called it quits at some point!

name: “Passionate Birthday” Karin Asaka
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 [(4) Put 1 event from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and 【REST】 it.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Relaxing With Emma, Emma Verde
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Wow, so this is a penny candy store! Oh my gosh! There are so many candies I've never seen before!

name: “Ideal Birthday” Kanata Konoe
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 If you do not have another 《Music》 character, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters you have ×500.

name: Feelings to Express, Rina Tennoji
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the level of that card +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, if "Rainbow Rose, Rina Tennoji" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more "Connecting Melody, Rina Tennoji" in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavor_text: What would I do if I could really sing in cyberspace? Hm, I could ride the digital waves and go anywhere, right? I'd be able to connect with even more people then.

name: Connecting Melody, Rina Tennoji
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may choose 1 "Connecting Melody, Rina Tennoji" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.

【ACT】 [(2) Put this 【STAND】 card into your memory] If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Favorite Pillow
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: I can't believe I fell asleep in front of you and revealed my secret!

name: Rainbow Rose, Rina Tennoji
expansion: [EX] Love Live! School idol festival Series 10th Anniversary
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
